reviewText: I agree with the other reviewers that STAG: TOPLESS TREASURES is a very fun DVD. It's humorous to see these guys getting wild with strippers at their bachelor parties, only to have their fiancees hit the ceiling when they see the resulting video of it. I'd like to see a TV series of this every week. However, I think it's fair to note that for anyone looking specifically for a DVD of sexy girls, they're really not shown that much here. Each of the two segments runs about 30 minutes, and in the first segment, setting up the situation takes approximately 11 minutes, then while the guy and his male friends are shooting pool a girl strips down to lingerie and briefly lolls about on the table, then there's several minutes shown traveling to another location, then they arrive at that location where the strippers are finally shown, and the segment ends with about 8 minutes of the guy and his fiancee watching the video of his shenanegans. Also, a lot of the camera time is taken up by interviews with the "contestants," reaction shots of each guy's male friends, and so on. So you see, there's not that much time that the sexy girls are actually shown. The second segment is similarly divided up, but does a lot better job of showing the girls, both time-wise and in camera angles that show them to better advantage. So how much this DVD fits the bill for you depends on what you want it for. STAG: TOPLESS TREASURES is a fun and humorous show, but if you're really looking for a DVD only of sexy girls at bachelor parties, it's better to get a DVD that's specifically of that. For instance, Bachelor Party Blowout Volume 1 and World's Wildest Bachelor Parties (I'm not sure that this is the same as my copy, so I'm not endorsing it) are both comprised almost entirely of girls dancing at bachelor parties.

If I were going to get married and have a stag party, the last thing I would be dumb enough to do is allow a camera crew to follow me, film what happens and then show the tape to my future wife. And, that is exactly what happens on this show. And for toppers, they film the future wife's reaction, as if it would be anything other than near homicidal rage.

From my perspective, these guys have to love the thought of being on television or tape to be so dumb. Weddings are too expensive to cancel at the last moment, and, I have grown fond of certain parts of my body that I am sure a future wife would rip off if she saw me behaving like these guys do! And the cameras capture pretty much what everyone who is at the party sees. (or in the case of clothes, doesn't see)

Throw in a perfect "host" who is sympathetic to the female while egging the guys on, and you are in for a fun treat. This is a great DVD if you like to see conflict and a little body action at the same time!

Tommy Habeeb the co-creator and original host of Cheaters steps it up a notch with Stag. Here he gets guys to let him film their stag parties and then shows it to their fiancee. Now you would think that the guy tones it down because he is being filmed..well you would be thinking wrong. Their antics are very funny, not really because of what they are doing, but because you know the girl is going to see it. To say that fireworks ensue is an understatment. While I wish it provided info on whether the couple stays together, this show is one of the best of it's genre. Tommy is very good at talking to the couples, but he's not afraid to tell the guy off with sometimes comical results.
